theorem P1_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 (A : Set X) → Topology.P1 (B : Set X) → Topology.P1 (A ∪ B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P1] at hA hB ⊢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hxA =>
      have hxA' : x ∈ closure (interior (A : Set X)) := hA hxA
      have hSub : closure (interior (A : Set X)) ⊆ closure (interior (A ∪ B)) := by
        apply closure_mono
        have : interior (A : Set X) ⊆ interior (A ∪ B) := by
          apply interior_mono
          intro y hy
          exact Or.inl (interior_subset hy)
        exact this
      exact hSub hxA'
  | inr hxB =>
      have hxB' : x ∈ closure (interior (B : Set X)) := hB hxB
      have hSub : closure (interior (B : Set X)) ⊆ closure (interior (A ∪ B)) := by
        apply closure_mono
        have : interior (B : Set X) ⊆ interior (A ∪ B) := by
          apply interior_mono
          intro y hy
          exact Or.inr (interior_subset hy)
        exact this
      exact hSub hxB'

theorem P3_closure_iff_open_closure {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 (closure (A : Set X)) ↔ IsOpen (closure A) := by
  constructor
  · intro hP3
    dsimp [Topology.P3] at hP3
    have h₁ : closure (A : Set X) ⊆ interior (closure A) := by
      simpa [closure_closure] using hP3
    have h₂ : interior (closure A) ⊆ closure A := interior_subset
    have hEq : interior (closure A) = closure A := subset_antisymm h₂ h₁
    have hOpenInt : IsOpen (interior (closure A)) := isOpen_interior
    simpa [hEq] using hOpenInt
  · intro hOpen
    dsimp [Topology.P3]
    simpa [closure_closure, hOpen.interior_eq]
